text: Æt Batanhagan Wulfgaro & æt ðære pyrian.
His metis prefatum rus hinc inde giratur.
Eac we him writað þone hagan be suþan wealle wið sancte Petres circan his dæg & twam oþrum æfter him.
Ðis syndon þære halfre hide landgemæru æt baten hale.
Ærest of þan readan ofre ondlong stræte on Æþelmundes gemære.
Ondlong gemæres<../images/tbar.gif>in þæt eorþebyrst.
Of þon eorðgebyrste on reod leage<../images/tbar.gif>ondlong þæs broces in tittenhalh.
<../images/tbar.gif>embuten calfre croft<../images/tbar.gif>cymeð eft in þone broc.
Þæt swa on east crofte.
Þæt swa ondlong þære hege ræwe.
<../images/tbar.gif>on ondoncilles wombe þæt þaraXIIæcras on west healfe þære stræte & an medwa beneoðan þæm hliþe eft ondlonges hole broces<../images/tbar.gif>up ongean þa cotu on þa stræt.
Ondlong stræte<../images/tbar.gif>on readan ofre & norð croft þærto.
Þis is þæs feorðan dæles landgemæru.
Up æt þære pirian ærest of gold burnan ondlonges þære hegce<../images/tbar.gif>up on þone hyll.
Þæt of ðæm hylle ofer þære port stræte up on þone oþerne hyll.
Of þæm hylle dun in þæt dæll.
<../images/tbar.gif>ondlong þæs dæles.
Þæt up on þone hyll behionan lip perd ofer mid þone graf.
Þæt on þæne mid lestan hole weg.
Onlong þæs weges þæt in þa hegce wið westan þa cotu ondlonges hegce eft in gold burnan.

Eac we writað him þa circan & þone circstall & þone worþig to þære burnan & þone croft be suþan þære burnan &VIæcras mæde on þa gerefmæde & ic on him be Godes bletsunga & be ure ægþer ge wuda ge on felda swa his boc him wisaþ.
